00006 #include "maven.h"
00007 #include "struct_StringList.h"
00008 #include "struct_MavenCompiler.h"
00009 #include "struct_MavenObject.h"
00010 #include "strings.h"
00011 #include "errors.h"
00012 #include "objects.h"
00013 #include "keywords.h"
00014 #include "output.h"

00016 MavenObject* dissectObject(MavenCompiler* c, string line) {
00017         MavenObject* o = new MavenObject();
00018         StringList tokens = smartTokens(line);
00019         o->line = c->lineNumber;
00020         
00021         int i;
00022         for(i = 0; i < tokens.length(); ++i) {
00023                 if(tokens[i] == "class") break;
00024                 else if(tokens[i] == "abstract") o->isAbstract = true;
00025         }
00026         o->name = tokens[i + 1];
00027         
00028         if(tokens.length() > i + 2) {
00029                 if(tokens[i + 2] == "extends") {
00030                         // make sure the we already know what the class is
00031                         string path = cType(findObjectPath(c, tokens[i + 3]));
00032                         if(path == MAVEN_INVALID) {
00033                                 pushError(c, "Unknown extended class %s", tokens[i + 3]);
00034                                 return o;
00035                         }
00036                         extendObject(c, o, tokens[i + 3]);
00037                         return o;
00038                 } else {
00039                         pushError(c, "Expected 'extends' received '%s'", tokens[i + 2]);
00040                 }
00041         }
00042         
00043         // all Objects have to extend Object. This needs to be fixed to check if Object
00044         // is already extended.
00045         extendObject(c, o, "maven.Object");
00046         
00047         return o;
00048 }
